summary: Momo has one dream buried for years: become a petanque champion. When an international tournament is announced, he drops his ordinary life to win the first prize and fulfill his dreams.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Atmen Kelif|Virginie Efira|Daniel Prévost|Edouard Baer|Bruno Lochet|Carole Franck|Michel Galabru|Tassadit Mandi|Simon Abkarian|Pascal Elbé|Nader Boussandel|François Levantal|Igor Skreblin|Gérard Dubouche|Sacha Dahan|Matthieu Albertini|Roland Munter|Sandra Jouet|Nora Derdour|Benjamin Guillaume|Laurent Vernay|Michel Schatz|Jean-Paul Delhoume|Jean-Claude Gerolymos|Christian Ameri|Christophe Meynet|Guillaume Carcaud|Éric Bougnon|Jean-Claude Baudracco|Abdelhafid Metalsi|Jean-François Malet|Fabien Baïardi|Kaïs Boudjenah|Laurent Mentec|Rachid Hafassa|Léon Marti|Tariq Bettahar|Sid Ahmed Agoumi|Marco Foyot|Laurent Mouton|Dominique Bastien|Frédérique Bonnal|Joël Harhoure|Joël Heuzé|Jicey Carina|Laurent Casanova|Jessé Rémond Lacroix
title: Les invincibles
